source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 699,005 damage to your primary target and 149,590 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,718, further increased by 977 while you remain within its light.

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 11,849 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3.7 million Fire damage to your primary target and 296,207 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
